The '''Golden Wheel Reincarnation Explosion''' is a powerful technique utilised by [[Toneri Ōtsutsuki]]. 

== Usage ==
While being in the [[Tenseigan Chakra Mode]], Toneri focuses a tremendous amount of [[chakra]] into one of his [[Truth-Seeking Ball]]s and grasps it in his hand to create a giant golden sword of pure chakra, capable of easily slicing the entire [[moon]] in half with a single swipe. He could also focus it into a blast, capable of blowing away the crust of the Moon with ease.
